Today (2024-May-09) is Thargēliṓn 1, νουμηνίᾳ Θαργηλιῶνος, day 297 of 354 in the year 2023/2024.
This Thargēliṓn will have 29 days, which the ancient Greeks called a “hollow month” (κοῖλος μήν) as opposed to a “full month” (πλήρης μήν) of 30.

Festivals in Thargēliṓn:

6: Birthday of Artemis
6–7: Thargelia (Θαργήλια)
7: Birthday of Apollo
19: Bendideia (Βενδίδεια)
25: Plynteria (Πλυντήρια)
